|ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Micrel;KSZ8721BL; |sw1chip = Micrel;KSZ8995MA; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:18:01 |oui = 00:18:01 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = RedBoot;;; |stockos = Linux;2.4.21;Jungo OpenRG; |exp_if_types = Mini PCI |exp_minipci_num = 1 |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bg |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = XXXXX,AP2500-A1 |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, LEDE Project, OpenWrt, |availability = Discontinued |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 07/2006 |reldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Actiontec 802MRG |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Ralink;RT2560; |rad1chip2 = Ralink;RT2525; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The device presumably uses two '''Entropic Communications''' EN2010 for the coaxial ([http://www.mocalliance.org/ MoCA]) connections. Switch / PHY P/Ns may vary, older models will likely have '''Kendin''' branded chips (see the SmallNetBuilder image) whereas newer devices will probably have '''Micrel branded chips The default SSID follows a pattern of 5 letters and numbers (example: '''07NJ8'''). The AP may take on an SSID of '''AP2500-A1''' for a short period of time while booting or resetting to factory defaults. ==Links of Interest== [http://opensource.actiontec.com/mi424wracd.html GPL Code download center]
